meanings.definition: A toxic alkaloid found in poison hemlock.
meanings.sent1: The coniines in poison hemlock can be very harmful if ingested.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of coniines on the human body.

meanings.sent5: The coniines acted like a silent assassin, slowly causing damage.
